Title: "The Unveiling of Ripley"

From the peripheral penumbra of New York squalor,
Clutches Ripley, as Scott breathes a pulsing mettle.
An antihero unveiled – through Highsmith's immortal hallows,
A charm kinked with reptilian sparks and furtelle.
In the Netflix-adapted shadows, he peels away layers,
With a splendour that high-strung fans and critics will relay,
Scott's Ripley, our enigmatic play-goer; the psychedelic swayer.
